parameters.content:
=======================================
        IMAGE TO VIDEO GENERATOR
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/

üöÄ Need a scalable solution for generating 
   and automating media buying?
   Check out ROASPIG.com
=======================================

## üé¨ **WAN-VIDEO 2.5 - IMAGE TO VIDEO WORKFLOW**

**üî• Powered by Replicate API and n8n Automation**

---

### üìù **Model Overview**

- **Owner**: wan-video
- **Model**: wan-2.5-i2v
- **Type**: Image to Video Generation
- **API Endpoint**: https://api.replicate.com/v1/models/wan-video/wan-2.5-i2v/predictions

**üéØ What This Model Does:**
Transforms static images into dynamic videos using AI. Perfect for creating promotional videos, social media content, and animated presentations from single images.

---

### üìã **Parameter Reference**

**üî¥ Required Parameters:** 
- **image** (string): Input image URL to animate
- **prompt** (string): Description of the desired video motion and action

**üîµ Optional Parameters:** 
- **seed** (integer): Random seed for reproducible generation
- **num_frames** (integer): Number of frames to generate (affects video length)
- **guidance_scale** (number): How closely to follow the prompt (7-15 typical)
- **num_inference_steps** (integer): Quality vs speed tradeoff (20-50 typical)
- *Additional parameters available in API documentation*

---

### üîß **Workflow Components Explained**

**üéØ Manual Trigger**
- Starts the workflow execution
- Click to begin video generation process

**üîê Set API Token** 
- Configures your Replicate API authentication
- Replace with your actual Replicate API token
- Essential for accessing the wan-video model

**‚öôÔ∏è Add Seed Image and Prompt**
- Sets the input image URL and video prompt
- Properly formats the prompt to handle quotes
- Pre-configured with AG1 marketing video example

**üöÄ Create Video**
- Sends the generation request to Replicate API
- Uses wan-video/wan-2.5-i2v model
- Returns a prediction ID for status tracking

**‚è≥ Wait & Status Checking Loop**
- Waits 5 seconds then checks prediction status
- Continues checking until completion or failure
- Implements intelligent retry logic with 10-second delays

**‚úÖ Success/Error Handling**
- Routes successful completions to success response
- Handles failures gracefully with error details
- Returns structured JSON response with video URL or errors

**üìä Logging & Monitoring**
- Logs all requests for debugging and monitoring
- Tracks timestamps and prediction IDs
- Helps identify issues during development

---

### üåü **Key Benefits**

- **üé¨ AI Video Generation**: Transform static images into engaging videos
- **üì± Perfect for Social Media**: Create dynamic content for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube
- **üîÑ Automated Workflow**: Handles the complete generation pipeline automatically
- **üõ°Ô∏è Error Resilience**: Built-in retry logic and comprehensive error handling
- **üìà Production Ready**: Includes logging, monitoring, and structured responses
- **‚ö° Efficient Processing**: Optimized API calls with intelligent status checking

---

### üöÄ **Quick Start Instructions**

1. **üîë Get Your API Key**
   - Sign up at https://replicate.com
   - Navigate to your account settings
   - Copy your API token

2. **üîß Configure the Workflow**
   - Replace the API token in "Set API Token" node
   - Update image URL in "Add Seed Image and Prompt" node
   - Customize the prompt for your desired video motion

3. **‚ñ∂Ô∏è Execute the Workflow**
   - Click the 'Manual Trigger' to start
   - Monitor the execution in the n8n interface
   - Check logs for detailed execution information

4. **üì• Get Your Results**
   - Successful generations return a URL to your video
   - Download the MP4 file from the provided URL
   - Video typically ready in 30-120 seconds

---

### üîç **Troubleshooting Guide**

**Common Issues:**
- **Invalid API Token**: Ensure your Replicate token is valid and has sufficient credits
- **Image URL Issues**: Verify the image URL is publicly accessible
- **Prompt Formatting**: Use single quotes inside prompts to avoid JSON errors
- **Generation Timeout**: Video generation can take 1-3 minutes - be patient

**Best Practices:**
- Use high-quality input images (minimum 512x512)
- Write detailed, specific prompts for better results
- Test with shorter prompts first, then add complexity
- Keep API tokens secure - use n8n credentials feature
- Monitor your Replicate usage and billing

---

### üìù **Example Use Cases**

- **Product Demos**: Animate product images with usage demonstrations
- **Social Media Ads**: Create eye-catching video ads from product photos
- **Story Telling**: Bring illustrations to life with motion
- **Marketing Content**: Transform static campaigns into dynamic videos
- **Educational Content**: Animate diagrams and infographics

---

**üîó Additional Resources:**
- Model Documentation: https://replicate.com/wan-video/wan-2.5-i2v
- Replicate API Docs: https://replicate.com/docs
- n8n Documentation: https://docs.n8n.io

---

assignments.name: Prompt
assignments.value: 5-Second AG1 'Game Changer' Video Prompt Scene Setup: Woman in modern kitchen (white cropped hoodie, olive green leggings), holding AG1 package with both hands at chest level, green smoothie in blender visible to the side Action (0-5 seconds): 0-1 sec: Start with her looking down at the AG1 package 1-2 sec: She looks up at camera with growing smile (like discovering something amazing) 2-4 sec: Holds package up slightly higher, direct eye contact: 'This is an absolute GAME changer!' 4-5 sec: Quick confident nod while bringing package back to chest level, maintaining smile Camera: Static shot or very subtle push-in Frame from waist up (like reference photo) Bright, natural lighting Kitchen background slightly blurred for focus on her and product Energy: Authentic excitement, like she's sharing a secret with her best friend - natural, not overly polished

parameters.content: 1- Add a link to your Seed image. If you dont have one, you can generate it using OpenAI or Nano Banana

## üìù **PROMPT WRITING GUIDELINES**

### ‚ùå **AVOID These Characters:**
- Double quotes (`"`) - Will break JSON parsing
- Backslashes (`\`) - Can cause escape sequence issues
- Line breaks/Enter key - Makes JSON invalid
Connect this node to your storage in order to save the predictions

## Batch Processing Guide

## üîÑ Optional: Generate Multiple Videos

Connect the "Batch Process Videos" node after "Set API Token" for bulk generation.

### Three Options:

**Option 1: Same Image + Same Prompt = Multiple Videos**
- Get different variations from identical inputs
- Example: 1 product photo ‚Üí 5 unique videos

**Option 2: Same Image + Different Prompts = Multiple Videos**
- Test different animations on one image  
- Example: 1 photo with 10 different prompts

**Option 3: Different Images + Different Prompts = Multiple Videos**
- Bulk create unique content
- Example: 50 products, each with custom prompt
